page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox layout object
page.description: Definition of a column in a layout in the list.

discussion.p: There are two main types of list layouts. These are "column" layouts and "template" layouts.
In "column" layouts the list will be formatted as a grid with columns of data. An array of column object (see *[link:A5.ListBox Column Object]*) is used to define the layout.

There are three types of "template" layouts. These are "template", "template-flow" and "template-horizontal". In the base "template" layout, a free-form template will be used to create each list item. The items will be arranged vertically, each item taking up an entire line. In a "template-flow" layout each item in the list will be flowed one after the other, creating a snaking layout. In a "template-horizontal" layout the list items will be arranged onto a single horizontally scrolling line.

property.name: type
property.description: The type of layout. Layout types include "column", "template", "template-flow", "template-horizontal", and "cutsom".

property.name: columns
property.description: An array of *[link:A5.ListBox Column Object]* objects to use for columnar layouts, or to display for sorting at the top of free-form layouts.

property.name: template
property.description: The template for the row in a free-form layout, or an additional free-form layout to include in each row of a columnar layout. See *[link:A5.u.template]*.

property.name: draw
property.description: Draw method for a "custom" layout. The scope of the function will be the *[link:A5.ListBox]*.

argument.name: type
argument.description: The type of draw. The value will be either "initial", "refresh", or "resize".

argument.name: element
argument.description: The elment that contains the "custom" layout.

property.name: scroll
property.description: Scroll settings overrides for the layout.

property.name: item
property.description: Settings for the list items in this layout.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the list item in CSS units.

property.name: height
property.description: The height of the list item in CSS units.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on a list item.

property.name: hoverClassName
property.description: The class name to put on a list item when the user mouses over it.

property.name: selectedClassName
property.description: The class name to put on a list item when it is selected.

property.name: style
property.description: The CSS to put on a list item.

property.name: titleClassName
property.description: The class name to put on a list group title item.

property.name: separatorClassName
property.description: The class name to put on a list item separator.

property.name: items
property.description: The definition of named items to be used in this layout. See *[link:A5.ListBox Item Object]*.
